title: KISSAIR Compact 1500W/750W Space Heater with Thermostat - ETL Certified Ceramic Portable Heater Fan, Ideal for Home/Dorm/Office/Kitchen, Black; indoor, electric, size: 7.72" x 6.38" x 9.13"; weight: 2.6 pounds, three modes: heating 750W, heating 1500W, air circulation; safety: automatically turns off at 45 degrees; delivers heating in 2 seconds, PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient), noise below 45 dB
descriptions:
**Product Listing:**

Introducing the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat, your ultimate solution to staying warm and cozy in any indoor space! This sleek, black heater is perfect for use in various settings, including your home, dorm, office, or kitchen.

**Powerful Heating Options:**
With two power options, you can easily adjust the heat to your comfort. Choose between 750W for low heat or 1500W for high heat. Need to circulate air without the heat? No problem! The fan mode has got you covered.

**Advanced Safety Features:**
Safety is a top priority, and this heater is equipped with advanced safety features. It comes with overheat protection and tip-over protection, which automatically shuts off the heater if it is tipped over at an angle of 45 degrees or more.

**Compact and Lightweight:**
With dimensions of 7.72 inches in width, 6.38 inches in depth, and 9.13 inches in height, and a weight of just 2.6 pounds, this heater is compact and lightweight, making it easy to move from room to room as needed.

**Certified and Reliable:**
This heater is ETL certified, ensuring its safety and reliability. It uses a PTC (Positive Temperature Coefficient) heating element for quick and efficient heating, taking only 2 seconds to heat up.

**Quiet Operation:**
With a noise level of below 45 dB, this heater operates quietly, allowing you to enjoy the warmth without any disturbance.

**Intuitive Controls and Thermostat:**
The KISSAIR Compact Space Heater comes with intuitive controls and a thermostat, allowing you to easily adjust the temperature to your liking. It also features rapid heat generation, low thermal resistance, and quiet operation, making it a top choice for your heating needs.

**Ideal Coverage Area:**
This heater is ideal for spaces up to 200 square feet. Whether you're looking to heat a small room or a larger space, the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater has got you covered.

Experience the perfect blend of comfort, safety, and efficiency with the KISSAIR Compact Space Heater with Thermostat. Order yours today!
